name: general_contains_paths
description: Explore general CONTAINS relationships between IFC elements with all node and relationship properties.
cypher:
MATCH p = ()-[:CONTAINS]->()
RETURN
  [n IN nodes(p) | {elementId: elementId(n), labels: labels(n), props: properties(n)}] AS nodes,
  [r IN relationships(p) | {elementId: elementId(r), type: type(r), props: properties(r)}] AS rels
LIMIT 600

name: all_doors_full_props
description: Retrieve all IfcDoor elements with their complete property maps.
cypher:
MATCH (d:IfcDoor)
RETURN
  elementId(d) AS elementId,
  labels(d) AS labels,
  properties(d) AS props
LIMIT 200

name: all_windows_full_props
description: Retrieve all IfcWindow elements with their complete property maps.
cypher:
MATCH (w:IfcWindow)
RETURN
  elementId(w) AS elementId,
  labels(w) AS labels,
  properties(w) AS props
LIMIT 200

name: windows_contains_all_props
description: Find windows contained in other elements (like walls or storeys) with all properties of both container and window.
cypher:
MATCH (container)-[:CONTAINS]->(window:IfcWindow)
RETURN
  elementId(container) AS containerElementId,
  labels(container) AS containerLabels,
  properties(container) AS containerProps,
  elementId(window) AS windowElementId,
  labels(window) AS windowLabels,
  properties(window) AS windowProps

name: windows_has_opening_all_props
description: Find windows using HAS_OPENING relationship with complete property maps for both nodes and the relationship.
cypher:
MATCH (container)-[rel:HAS_OPENING]->(window:IfcWindow)
RETURN
  elementId(container) AS containerElementId,
  labels(container) AS containerLabels,
  properties(container) AS containerProps,
  elementId(rel) AS relElementId,
  type(rel) AS relType,
  properties(rel) AS relProps,
  elementId(window) AS windowElementId,
  labels(window) AS windowLabels,
  properties(window) AS windowProps

name: doors_contains_all_props

cypher:

name: doors_has_opening_all_props
description: Find doors connected through HAS_OPENING relationships, returning full property maps for container, door, and relationship.
cypher:
MATCH (container)-[rel:HAS_OPENING]->(door:IfcDoor)
RETURN
  elementId(container) AS containerElementId,
  labels(container) AS containerLabels,
  properties(container) AS containerProps,
  elementId(rel) AS relElementId,
  type(rel) AS relType,
  properties(rel) AS relProps,
  elementId(door) AS doorElementId,
  labels(door) AS doorLabels,
  properties(door) AS doorProps

name: count_ifc_elements
description: Count all IFC elements grouped by their IFC type.
cypher:
MATCH (n)
WHERE n.ifcType IS NOT NULL
RETURN n.ifcType AS type, count(n) AS count
ORDER BY count DESC
